newsitem.title: USA: Macrochem Corp stake raised by group.
newsitem.headline: Macrochem Corp stake raised by group.

text.p: A group including WisdomTree Capital Management Inc said Wednesday it raised its stake in MacroChem Corp to 6.3 percent or 979,100 common shares from a previous stake of 5.0 percent or 777,400 shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it bought 201,700 shares of the Massachusetts-based company between Jan. 20 and 31 at prices ranging from $5.98 to $7.11 per share.
Others named in the filing were WisdomTree Associates LP and WisdomTree Offshore Ltd.
